name: Parkour FPS
description:
Parkur FPS Multiplayer, to join a server you will need the server IPv4, but if you host the server on your computer you can Type : 127.0.0.1 (host default address)

highly inspiration from Dani video game "Karslon".

The Demo did not including settings, in the real game you can change keybinds, graphics and audio stuff. the demo is without multiplayer, is only for you to see how to game looks and if you want to buy the full game.
